import React from 'react'; import { Link, Outlet, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState } from 'react'; import { FaKey, FaUsers, FaClock, FaPaperPlane, FaCog, FaSignOutAlt, FaBars, FaTimes, } from 'react-icons/fa'; import icon from '../assets/icon.png'; export default function Menu() { const location = useLocation(); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(true); const toggleMenu = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen); const linkClass = (path) => `flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-2 rounded-md text-white transition ${ location.pathname === path ? 'bg-cyan-700 border border-cyan-300' : 'hover:bg-cyan-800' }`; return (
Contraseñas Grupos Historial de acceso Enviar Contraseña Ajustes Cerrar Sesión
); }
